elements.name: question1
elements.title: It is half a meter long, has brown fur, lays eggs, can swim and suckles its young. What is it?

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Is there a machine that runs by itself without the need for gasoline, electricity, gas, etc.? What do you call such a thing?
elements.correctAnswer: No, there are no so-called perpetual motion machines.

elements.name: question2
elements.title: If you win the lottery, you have to pay tax on the winnings - between a quarter and half of the winnings, depending on where you live. In which canton would you have to pay the least tax if you won the lottery?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Did you know that you are not the same height in the morning and in the evening? How big is the difference and why?
elements.correctAnswer: One to two centimeters, because the intervertebral discs of the spine are compressed during the day.
